vip.INFO_DESCRIPTION_1: Earn free credits with every new levelâ€”more levels, more rewards!
vip.INFO_DESCRIPTION_2: Play your favorites, earn cash back. It's that simple!
vip.INFO_DESCRIPTION_3: Celebrate with us! Enjoy free credits on your birthday.
vip.INFO_DESCRIPTION_4: Celebrate each festival with a special mystery gift, just for you!
vip.QA_TITLE_1: How can I become a VIP member?
vip.QA_CONTENT_1: To qualify for lifetime Bronze Member status, you must accumulate deposits totaling at least SGD 30,000.
vip.QA_TITLE_2: How many levels are in the VIP program?
vip.QA_CONTENT_2: To upgrade your membership, you must meet the minimum deposit requirements for the next tier. For instance, upgrading from Bronze to Silver requires a total deposit of at least SGD 150,000, and moving from Silver to Rose Gold requires deposits totaling SGD 550,000.
vip.QA_TITLE_3: What is the validity of my VIP membership status?
vip.QA_CONTENT_3: Membership status for the Gold level and below is valid for a lifetime. Platinum and Diamond levels are valid for one month.
vip.QA_TITLE_4: How can I maintain my Platinum/Diamond membership status?
vip.QA_CONTENT_4: To retain your Platinum or Diamond status for the next month, you must deposit the specified amount by the end of the current month. For example, maintaining Platinum status requires a deposit of SGD 50,000 each month.
vip.QA_TITLE_5: Is there a fee to participate in the VIP program?
vip.QA_CONTENT_5: No, there are no annual or monthly fees. Our VIP program is designed to reward the loyalty of members who consistently engage with B9Casino since their registration date.

poker_king.Ticket_Redemption_1: Deposit a minimum of SGD100 (daily first deposit) to receive one (1) mini-game ticket.
poker_king.Ticket_Redemption_2: Accumulate SGD2,000 or more in deposits on the same day to receive an additional five (5) tickets (total of 6 tickets).
poker_king.Ticket_Redemption_3: Receive three (3) extra tickets for every 10th spin.
poker_king.Example_1: Participant A: Makes an initial deposit of SGD100 (1 ticket), then adds SGD1,900 the same day, totaling SGD2,000, earning an additional 5 tickets (6 tickets total).
poker_king.Example_2: Participant B: Deposits SGD2,000 in one transaction, instantly receiving 6 tickets.
poker_king.How_to_Play_1: Click "Draw" to draw your first card and determine your initial hand. Click here for tutorial how to play
poker_king.Important_Notes_1: Prizes will be credited within 60 seconds.
poker_king.Important_Notes_2: All prizes must meet a 1x turnover requirement before withdrawal.
poker_king.Important_Notes_3: Only one account per individual, family, household, email, phone number, bank account, or IP address is permitted.
poker_king.Important_Notes_4: B9Casino reserves the right to amend or terminate this promotion at any time.

promotions_page.description1: Power up your play with 100% when join B9 Casino welcome bonus and received up to SGD 1,880!
promotions_page.title2: Poker King - Double up your Deposit
promotions_page.description2: Power up your deposit with 100% guarantee prize poker king card spin and win up to SGD888 Cash Rewards.
promotions_page.detail_title: Poker King - Double up your Deposit
promotions_page.detail_title1_1: Daily Deposit: Earn one ticket for your first daily deposit of SGD100 or more.
promotions_page.detail_title1_2: High Roller Bonus: Accumulate deposits of SGD2,000 or more in a day to receive five additional tickets.
promotions_page.detail_title1_3: Bonus Spins: Gain three extra tickets for every 10th spin you make.
promotions_page.detail_title2_1: Begin by clicking the "Draw" button to reveal your initial card and start the game.
promotions_page.detail_title3_1: Participate by making a minimum first deposit of SGD100 daily. You can earn a maximum of one ticket per day, plus additional tickets for higher total deposits.
promotions_page.detail_title3_2: A SGD100 initial deposit earns one ticket. If the total deposit reaches SGD2,000 the same day, five more tickets are added.
promotions_page.detail_title3_3: A single deposit of SGD2,000 earns six tickets immediately.
promotions_page.detail_title3_4: Prizes are credited to accounts within 60 seconds.
promotions_page.detail_title3_5: All prizes must be wagered once before withdrawal.
promotions_page.detail_title3_6: Limited to one account per person, household, or IP address.
promotions_page.detail_title3_7: B9Casino reserves the right to modify or terminate this promotion at any time.
promotions_page.detail_title3_8: Adheres to B9Casino's General Terms & Conditions.

voucher_page.title1: B9 welcome you aboard giveaway FREE SGD10 credit.
voucher_page.title2: 100% Deposit Bonus. Up to SGD500 Welcome you aboard.
voucher_page.title3: Get Free X50 Free Spin on Pragmatic Slots
voucher_page.Select_the_Bonus_content: Members must choose the "STARTER BONUS" on the deposit form. This bonus is available once per new member.
voucher_page.Deposit_content: Deposit Make your first deposit of SGD50 and receive a matching SGD50 Starter Bonus with only a 1x turnover requirement.
voucher_page.terms_1: You must bet the total amount of your deposit plus bonus once (SGD100 total) before making a withdrawal.
voucher_page.terms_2: Bets placed on draws, both sides, void/cancelled games, or selections with odds below 0.5 or 1.50, as well as bets on 3 Pictures, Casino Hold'em/Poker, Blackjack, RNG games, 4D Lottery, and Roulette betting more than 24 numbers are excluded from turnover calculations.
voucher_page.terms_3: If any bet leads to suspected fraud, B9Casino may confiscate funds and winnings, including capital funds and bonuses.
voucher_page.terms_4: The bonus and winnings will be forfeited if not wagered at least once within 30 days of claiming.
voucher_page.terms_5: All Mega888 games are excluded from this promotion's turnover calculation.
voucher_page.terms_6: This bonus cannot be combined with other offers.
voucher_page.terms_7: Limited to one account per individual, family, household address, email, phone number, bank account, and IP address.
voucher_page.terms_8: B9Casino's general terms and conditions apply. B9Casino reserves the right to cancel this promotion at any time for any player.

cash_rebate_page.note_1: The daily cash rebate period runs from 00:00:00 to 23:59:59 (GMT+8) each day.
cash_rebate_page.note_2: Daily cash rebates update at 5:00 AM, and members can claim them starting then.
cash_rebate_page.note_3: The minimum payout for cash rebates is SGD 1.00.
cash_rebate_page.note_4: Unclaimed cash rebates from the previous week (Monday - Sunday GMT+8) are automatically paid out every Monday.
cash_rebate_page.note_5: For additional information, please Click Here.
